statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeLeaveRequest WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT leave_type, start_date, end_date FROM EmployeeLeaveRequest WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeLeaveRequest WHERE reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS leave_count FROM EmployeeLeaveRequest GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT DISTINCT leave_type FROM EmployeeLeaveRequest ORDER BY leave_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeLeaveRequest WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT employee_id, leave_type, start_date, end_date FROM EmployeeLeaveRequest WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeLeaveRequest WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, leave_type, start_date, end_date, reason FROM EmployeeLeaveRequest WHERE reason IS NOT NULL AND status = 'pending' ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT employee_id, leave_type, status FROM EmployeeLeaveRequest WHERE status = 'pending' OR status = 'rejected' ORDER BY status, start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_name;
SELECT employee_name, department, position, join_date FROM employees WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, leave_balance FROM employees WHERE leave_balance < 15 ORDER BY leave_balance DESC;
SELECT employee_name, position, department FROM employees WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, leave_balance FROM employees ORDER BY leave_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM leave_requests WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, start_date, end_date, reason FROM employees, leave_requests WHERE employees.employee_id = leave_requests.employee_id AND department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, position, status FROM employees INNER JOIN leave_requests ON employees.employee_id = leave_requests.employee_id WHERE leave_requests.reason LIKE '%vacation%';
SELECT * FROM employee_leave_requests;
SELECT start_date, end_date, leave_type FROM employee_leave_requests WHERE status='approved';
SELECT employee_name, job_title, department FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT approval_id, approval_date, approved_status FROM leave_approvals WHERE approved_status='pending' ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, job_title, supervisor_id FROM employees WHERE department='IT';
SELECT * FROM employee_leave_requests WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, job_title FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT employee_id, start_date, end_date FROM employee_leave_requests WHERE leave_type = 'Vacation' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department, supervisor_id FROM employees WHERE job_title = 'Manager';
SELECT approval_id, approval_date, approved_status FROM leave_approvals WHERE approver_id = 101 ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT * FROM LeaveRequest WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT employee_name, start_date, end_date FROM LeaveRequest ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT e.employee_name, l.reason, la.approval_date FROM Employee e JOIN LeaveRequest l ON e.employee_id = l.employee_id JOIN LeaveApproval la ON l.request_id = la.request_id WHERE la.approver_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM Employee
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR'
SELECT * FROM LeaveRequest WHERE status = 'approved'

SELECT Employee.employee_name, LeaveRequest.start_date, LeaveApproval.approval_date FROM Employee JOIN LeaveRequest ON Employee.employee_id = LeaveRequest.employee_id JOIN LeaveApproval ON LeaveRequest.request_id = LeaveApproval.request_id
SELECT employee_name, department, annual_leave_days FROM Employee JOIN EmployeeLeaveBalance ON Employee.employee_id = EmployeeLeaveBalance.employee_id
SELECT * FROM employee
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employee WHERE department_id = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leave_requests
SELECT leave_request_id, employee_id, start_date, end_date FROM leave_requests WHERE status = 'pending'
SELECT department_id, department_name FROM departments ORDER BY department_name DESC
SELECT * FROM employee WHERE department = 'HR' AND salary > 50000 ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employee INNER JOIN leave_requests ON employee.employee_id = leave_requests.employee_id WHERE leave_type = 'sick'
SELECT department_id, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM employees_departments GROUP BY department_id ORDER BY total_employees DESC
SELECT * FROM leave_requests WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-06-30' LIMIT 10
SELECT department_name, AVG(salary) AS avg_salary FROM departments INNER JOIN employee ON departments.department_id = employee.department_id GROUP BY department_name ORDER BY avg_salary DESC
